trans-unit.source: Provides a way for developers to declare static connections in a content page when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control has been declared in the content page's associated master page.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma forma para programadores declarar estático ligações em conteúdo de uma página quando um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controlo foi declarado na página principal de associados a página conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The ProxyWebPartManager control exists for the particular scenario of declaring static connections in content pages when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control has already been declared in a master page.
trans-unit.target: O controlo não existe para o cenário em particular de declarar as ligações estáticas no conteúdo de ProxyWebPartManager páginas quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo já foi declarado numa página principal.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: By design, a Web page that uses Web Parts controls must contain one (and only one) <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control that manages all Web Parts controls on the page.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, uma página Web que utiliza os controlos de peças Web tem de conter um (e apenas um) <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo gere todos os controlos de peças Web na página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: When a Web Parts application uses master pages, it is common to place the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control in the master page, because all the content pages are merged with the master page at run time and the single <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control will manage all the Web Parts controls from all content pages.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma aplicação de peças Web utiliza páginas principais, é comum para colocar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlar na página principal, porque todas as páginas de conteúdo são intercaladas com a página principal no tempo de execução e o único <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo irá gerir os controlos de peças Web a partir de todas as páginas de conteúdo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: However, when developers want to declare static connections in the content pages of such an application, they might seem to face a limitation.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, quando os programadores pretenderem declarar ligações estáticas nas páginas de conteúdo desse tipo de aplicação, estes podem parecer não enfrentam uma limitação.

trans-unit.source: A static Web Parts connection can be declared only by adding an <`asp:webpartconnection>` element as a child of a `<staticconnections>` element, which itself must be a child of a `<asp:webpartmanager>` element.
trans-unit.target: Uma ligação de peças Web estática pode ser declarada apenas adicionando um `asp:webpartconnection>` elemento como subordinado de um `<staticconnections>` elemento, o próprio tem de ser um subordinado de um `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: But because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control was already declared in the master page, and is the one permitted <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, developers cannot declare additional <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controls in the content pages to add static connections.
trans-unit.target: Mas, dado que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo já tinha sido declarado na página principal e é aquele permitido <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo, os programadores não é possível declarar adicionais <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlos nas páginas de conteúdo para adicionar as ligações estáticas.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The ProxyWebPartManager control takes the place of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control in this scenario.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de ProxyWebPartManager ocorre do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo neste cenário.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Developers declare an `<asp:proxywebpartmanager>` element instead of an `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in their content pages, and can then declare static connections as child elements.
trans-unit.target: Os programadores declarar um `<asp:proxywebpartmanager>` elemento em vez de um `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento nos respetivos páginas de conteúdo e pode, em seguida, declarar ligações estáticas como subordinado elementos.

trans-unit.source: At run time, the connections in the ProxyWebPartManager control are simply added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control and treated like any other connection.
trans-unit.target: Em tempo de execução, as ligações no controlo ProxyWebPartManager simplesmente são adicionadas para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>coleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlar e tratada como qualquer outra ligação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because the ProxyWebPartManager control is used only in this particular development scenario, it has more limited functionality than the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class.
trans-unit.target: Porque o controlo de ProxyWebPartManager só é utilizado neste cenário de desenvolvimento específica, tem mais limitada funcionalidade que a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: In fact, although the ProxyWebPartManager control acts as a proxy to contain static connections for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control in content pages, it does not inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Na verdade, apesar do controlo de ProxyWebPartManager age como um proxy para conter ligações estáticas para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo nas páginas de conteúdo não herda a partir de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: It inherits directly from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class, and overrides only a few of the base members.
trans-unit.target: Herda diretamente a partir de <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>classe e substituições apenas alguns dos membros base.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.EnableTheming%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.Visible%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.SkinID%2A> properties are overridden and assigned values that prevent them from being used.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.EnableTheming%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.Visible%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.SkinID%2A>propriedades são substituídas e atribuídas valores impedem-los de que está a ser utilizado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.SkinID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.EnableTheming%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other inherited properties are overridden to adjust their design-time behavior, but otherwise they have the same behavior as the base properties.
trans-unit.target: Outras propriedades herdadas são substituídas para ajustar o respetivo comportamento de tempo de criação, mas caso contrário, têm o mesmo comportamento de propriedades de base.

trans-unit.source: These include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.Controls%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.ClientID%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Estes incluem a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.Controls%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.ClientID%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.ClientID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, the ProxyWebPartManager class has one non-inherited property.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, a classe do ProxyWebPartManager tem uma propriedade não herdado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> property returns its own collection of static connections (a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> object).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>propriedade devolve o seu próprio conjunto de ligações estáticas (um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection>objeto).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>

trans-unit.source: As for methods, the ProxyWebPartManager class similarly overrides only a few methods, mostly to restrict their use.
trans-unit.target: Para métodos, a classe do ProxyWebPartManager da mesma forma sobrepõe-se apenas a alguns métodos, sobretudo para restringir a utilização.

trans-unit.source: The inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.Focus%2A> method is made unusable by throwing an exception if called.
trans-unit.target: O herdados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.Focus%2A>método é graças inutilizável gerar uma exceção se a chamada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.Focus%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.CreateControlCollection%2A> method always returns an empty control collection, which has the effect of preventing it from being able to contain a collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.CreateControlCollection%2A>método devolve sempre uma coleção de controlo vazio, que tem o efeito de impedir a capacidade para conter uma coleção de controlos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.CreateControlCollection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method calls the base method, and then assigns the collection of connections referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.OnInit%2A>método chama o método base e, em seguida, atribui-lhe a recolha de ligações referenciadas pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>propriedade para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.OnInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: This has the effect of rolling up all the static connections declared in all content pages and making them part of the connections collection maintained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control in the master page.
trans-unit.target: Isto tem o efeito da agregar todas as ligações estáticas declaradas em todas as páginas de conteúdo e torná-los parte da coleção de ligações é mantida pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo na página principal.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control ID for HTML markup that is generated by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o ID de controlo do markup HTML que é gerado pelo ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: The control ID for HTML markup that is generated by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: O ID de controlo do markup HTML que é gerado pelo ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> object that represents the child controls for a specified server control in the UI hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> objeto que representa os controlos subordinados de um controlo de servidor especificado na hierarquia de IU.

trans-unit.source: The collection of child controls for the specified server control.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de controlos subordinados para o controlo de servidor especificado.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property to prevent the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager"></xref> control from containing controls.
trans-unit.target: Substitui a propriedade de base para impedir o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager"> </xref> controlo do que contenha controlos.

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlCollection method overrides the base method to prevent the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control from containing and returning collections of controls.
trans-unit.target: O método CreateControlCollection substitui o método base para impedir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>controlo que contém e devolver colecções de controlos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Its only purpose is to enable static connections to be declared in content pages within an application that uses master pages.
trans-unit.target: O objetivo apenas consiste em ativar as ligações estáticas seja declarado nas páginas de conteúdo dentro de uma aplicação que utiliza páginas principais.

trans-unit.source: Always returns an <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve sempre um <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property to prevent themes from being used.
trans-unit.target: Substitui a propriedade de base para impedir a utilização de temas.

trans-unit.source: The EnableTheming property overrides the base property to prevent themes from being used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade EnableTheming substitui a propriedade de base para impedir que temas a ser utilizado com o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This is to prevent it coming into conflict with any themes being used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control in the master page (its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EnableTheming%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property always returns `true`).
trans-unit.target: Este procedimento impede que o se entra em conflito com quaisquer temas a ser utilizados com o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo na página principal (respetivo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EnableTheming%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade devolve sempre `true`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EnableTheming%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, to prevent themes from being used.
trans-unit.target: Devolve sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, para impedir a utilização de temas.

trans-unit.source: A caller tries to assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: Um chamador tenta atribuir um valor para esta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base method to prevent the method from being called.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o método base para impedir que o método que está a ser chamado.

trans-unit.source: The Focus method overrides the base method and throws an exception if any caller attempts to call the method.
trans-unit.target: O método de foco substitui o método base e emite uma exceção se qualquer chamador tentar chamar o método.

trans-unit.source: This is because the inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is designed for controls with a user interface (UI), but the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control has no UI and therefore has no need to set the focus.
trans-unit.target: Isto acontece porque o herdados <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método foi concebido para controlos com uma interface de utilizador (IU), mas o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>controlo não tem uma IU e tem, pelo que não é necessário definir o foco.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A caller tries to call this method.
trans-unit.target: Um chamador tenta chamar este método.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event and initializes the control.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"> </xref> eventos e inicializa o controlo.

trans-unit.source: The OnInit method calls the base method, and then carries out tasks to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: O método ' OnInit chama o método base e, em seguida, acarreta tarefas ao inicializar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: An important task of this method is to assign the collection of connections referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: É uma tarefa importante deste método atribuir a recolha de ligações referenciadas pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>propriedade para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>do controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control from the associated master page is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controlo da página principal associado é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property to prevent a value from being assigned.
trans-unit.target: Substitui a propriedade de base para impedir que um valor a ser atribuída.

trans-unit.source: The SkinID property overrides the base property to prevent a value from being assigned to it, which has the effect of preventing skins from being used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: O SkinID propriedade substitui a propriedade de base para impedir que um valor a ser atribuído ao mesmo, que tem o efeito de impedir das máscaras de ser utilizada com o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This is done because the control never exposes a user interface (UI) on a page.
trans-unit.target: Isto é feito porque o controlo nunca as expõe uma interface de utilizador (IU) numa página.

trans-unit.source: The same behavior is implemented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control for its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SkinID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: O mesmo comportamento é implementado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlar do respetivo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SkinID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SkinID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Always returns an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Sempre devolve uma cadeia vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: A caller tries to assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: Um chamador tenta atribuir um valor para esta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of static connections declared within the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<asp:proxywebpartmanager>" name="<asp:proxywebpartmanager>" href=""></xref> element on a content page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um conjunto de ligações estáticas declarado no <xref uid="langword_csharp_<asp:proxywebpartmanager>" name="<asp:proxywebpartmanager>" href=""> </xref> elemento na página de conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The StaticConnections property references the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objects declared in an `<asp:proxywebpartmanager>` element.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade StaticConnections referencia a coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>objetos declarada num `<asp:proxywebpartmanager>` elemento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The connections contained in this collection are added to the static connections of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controls (referenced by its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection), and treated exactly like any other connections associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: As ligações contidas nesta coleção são adicionadas para as ligações estáticas do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlos (referenciado pelo respetivo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção) e tratada exatamente como quaisquer outras ligações associadas a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The declarative element that corresponds to the StaticConnections property is the `<staticconnections>` element.
trans-unit.target: O elemento declarativo que corresponde à propriedade StaticConnections é o `<staticconnections>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: In an application that uses master pages, the `<staticconnections>` element is added as a child of the `<asp:proxywebpartmanager>` element on a content page, and an `<asp:webpartconnection>` element in turn is added as a child of the `<staticconnections>` element.
trans-unit.target: Numa aplicação que utiliza páginas principais, o `<staticconnections>` elemento é adicionado como um elemento subordinado a `<asp:proxywebpartmanager>` elemento na página de conteúdo e um `<asp:webpartconnection>` elemento por sua vez é adicionado como um elemento subordinado a `<staticconnections>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: Multiple `<asp:webpartconnection>` elements can be added to one `<staticconnections>` element, and multiple content pages can declare static connections as part of a master pages application.
trans-unit.target: Vários `<asp:webpartconnection>` elementos podem ser adicionados a uma `<staticconnections>` elemento e várias páginas de conteúdo podem declarar ligações estáticas como parte de uma aplicação de páginas principal.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection"></xref> that contains all static <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> objects declared within an <xref uid="langword_csharp_<asp:proxywebpartmanager>" name="<asp:proxywebpartmanager>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection"> </xref> que contém todos os estática <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> objetos declarado dentro de um <xref uid="langword_csharp_<asp:proxywebpartmanager>" name="<asp:proxywebpartmanager>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property to prevent a value from being assigned.
trans-unit.target: Substitui a propriedade de base para impedir que um valor a ser atribuída.

trans-unit.source: The Visible property overrides the base property to prevent the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control from ever being made visible.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Visible substitui a propriedade de base para impedir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>controlo alguma vez que está a ser tomadas visível.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control, like the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, has no user interface (UI) and is never displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>controlar, como o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlar, não tem a nenhuma interface de utilizador (IU) e nunca é apresentada ao utilizador.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, to prevent the control from being made visible.
trans-unit.target: Devolve sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, para impedir que o controlo que está a ser ficam visíveis.

trans-unit.source: A caller tries to assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: Um chamador tenta atribuir um valor para esta propriedade.
